revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Seafoam Islands |image = [[File:Seafoam Islands.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of the Seafoam Islands. |tokens = 1,250 |location = East of Cinnabar Island, on route 19. }} The '''Seafoam Islands''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 17,226 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=9|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck |- | [[File:Golduck.png|40px]] Golduck |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Slowpoke |- | [[File:Slowbro.png|40px]] Slowbro |- | [[File:Horsea.png|40px]] Horsea |- | [[File:Krabby.png|40px]] Krabby |- |}
